liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

responseThreeWide.value: /me $user just finished a 3-wide $emote pyramid! Pretty good TPFufun
responseThreeWide.label: Three Wide
responseThreeWide.tooltip:
Message for completing a 3-wide emote pyramid.
 $user = Username
 $emote = emote of completed pyramid
